name: Danish Authors' and Performers' Rights Council
goal: The purpose of our organisation is to create an open forum, where questions regarding copyright can be discussed to the mutual benefit of our member organisations. The forum also makes it possible for member organisations to coordinate their answers to hearings requested by public entities, thereby providing the basis for a unified copyright strategy.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Single market
euInitiatives: EU's digital single market strategy, Copyright reform, Transfer of Value
